webfonts-load: The text shown in the webfont link
webfonts-enable-preference: Used as label for the checkbox, under {{msg-mw|Prefs-advancedediting}} section of {{msg-mw|Prefs-editing}} tab, in [[Special:Preferences]].
webfonts-menu-tooltip: Tooltip text displayed in the webfont link
webfonts-help-page: Change this only if you want to point the help link to a different wiki page.
webfonts-preview-sampletext: Do not translate literally, but give a [[:w:Pangram|pangram]] in your language for using as default preview text.
webfonts-preview-installing-fonts-text: Text pointing to the installation document link.
